sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './Pokemon.module.css' export default class Pokemon extends React.Component { state = { abilities: [], base_experience: 0, types: [], forms: [], height: 0, held_items: [], name : '', weight: 0, id: 0, stats: [], imageURL: '', } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/' + this.props.match.params.id).then(res=>{ const types = res.data.types.map(type=> type.type.name) this.setState({ abilities: res.data.abilities, base_experience: res.data.base_experience, forms: res.data.forms, height: (res.data.height)/10, id: res.data.id, weight: (res.data.weight/10), types: types, name: res.data.name, stats: res.data.stats, imageURL: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PokeAPI/sprites/master/sprites/pokemon/" + res.data.id + ".png" }) console.log(this.state) }).catch(error =>{ console.log(error) }) } render(){ var TYPE_COLOR = { normal: "grey", fire: "coral", fighting: "firebrick", water: "blue", flying: "mediumpurple", grass: "green", poison: "purple", electric: "yellow", ground: "khaki", psychic: "hotpink", rock: "tan", ice: "powderblue", bug: "yellowgreen", dragon: "darkslateblue", ghost: "rgb(106,90,205)", dark:"dimgray", steel:"lightgray", fairy:"pink", } return (
{this.state.id}
{this.state.types.map((type) => ( {type.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(letter => letter.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + letter.substring(1))} )) }

{this.state.name.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(letter => letter.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + letter.substring(1))}

{this.state.stats.map((stat,key) =>

{stat.stat.name}

{stat.base_stat}
)}

Attributes

Height: {this.state.height}

Weight: {this.state.weight}

Abilities {this.state.abilities.map((ability,key) =>{ return

{ability.ability.name}

})}

Base Experience: {this.state.base_experience}

) } }
